body: Exactly one year ago i was promoted to Junior Moderator by Newcleus & Peachy. It's also been a while since i last did an AMA, so ask away!!
body_tagged: Exactly one year ago i was promoted to Junior Moderator by Newcleus & Peachy. It's also been a while since i last did an AMA, so ask away!!
title: 1 Year Staff [AMA]

replies.body:
Jesus one year goes quick!
Still can't believe you're an Admin, I can still remember us fucking around and giving the Seniors shit when we were both mods xD
But after all that hard work you constantly put in, it was only a matter of time :P

How do you balance uni and this?
And what's harder? xD
replies.body_tagged:
Jesus one year goes quick!

How do you balance uni and this?
And what's harder? xD

Happy 1 year btw

replies.body: Well, i see it certainly still here. I don't know if we would still be in the same boat or a bit better off. If all goes to plan then i certainly see it in a good position, nothing like it use to be but better off than right now. I'm going to try and stay here for as long as possible, so hopefully in a years time I'll still be here.

I'm going to try and stay here for as long as possible, so hopefully in a years time I'll still be here.

Ah to be honest I'm not really sure. My first impression was that you are quite committed seeing that you wake up earlier just to play in scrims.

Ah to be honest, I'm happy with Cronus being my Dream team. 

La Vigen, CBT, Team Allah.

Purple

replies.body:
Thanks

Well on Competitive Minecraft it's certainly one of the more hidden aspexts when you think of Minecraft, usually you assosiate Minecraft with Blocks xD But it's fun as hell lol

In regards with Avicus, increasing Competitiveness to me is to fix the hit detection, the knockback and about every other glitch on this server. This in itself will be a tremendous task, but it's doable. I personally think that, right now, Avicus is a half way point for Compeittive Minecraft. It's inbetween OCN and Mineplex (LOL), it's like for people who are new to the competitive scene and want to start playing seriously but don't have enough experience to play competitive minecraft on netowrks like OCN.


I love Pizza XD (The food, not the senior moderator)

Ah well i can't really remember xD You seemed like a decent guy and a good candidate for moderator. Well now that i know you a bit more i know that my hunch that told me you would be a good moderator was right.

Team Allah
replies.body_tagged:
Thanks

replies.body:
PETER CONGRATS! Oh me and you being juniors last February camping up in the staff lounge 24/7. :P Miss being juniors together, was one of the biggest highlights of my time as staff last year. Seeing you progress up the ranks when I was senior was incredible and you didn't stop after the 6 times you missed on a promotion; you kept going and going and finally you got it! You reached your dream of being an administrator, and you're a great one too. Keep up the amazing work, you're doing so well.

  1. What was the last picture you took with your phone?
  2. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
  3. If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
  4. What cheers you up?
  5. What have you always wanted? Did you ever get it?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. What was your first impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Hope you're enjoying the Winter (is that right in Aussie land?) ! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body: Pfft, who likes the senior mod Pizza :')?
replies.body_tagged: Pfft, who likes the senior mod Pizza :')?

reply_to.body:
Thanks

Well on Competitive Minecraft it's certainly one of the more hidden aspexts when you think of Minecraft, usually you assosiate Minecraft with Blocks xD But it's fun as hell lol

In regards with Avicus, increasing Competitiveness to me is to fix the hit detection, the knockback and about every other glitch on this server. This in itself will be a tremendous task, but it's doable. I personally think that, right now, Avicus is a half way point for Compeittive Minecraft. It's inbetween OCN and Mineplex (LOL), it's like for people who are new to the competitive scene and want to start playing seriously but don't have enough experience to play competitive minecraft on netowrks like OCN.


I love Pizza XD (The food, not the senior moderator)

Ah well i can't really remember xD You seemed like a decent guy and a good candidate for moderator. Well now that i know you a bit more i know that my hunch that told me you would be a good moderator was right.

Team Allah
